title: Stan Dawson
text: Stan Dawson (12 August 1917 – 25 December 1973) was an <a href="Australian%20rules%20football">Australian rules football</a>er who played with <a href="Collingwood%20Football%20Club">Collingwood</a> and <a href="Fitzroy%20Football%20Club">Fitzroy</a> in the <a href="Victorian%20Football%20League%20%281897%E2%80%931989%29">Victorian Football League</a> (VFL). In 1941 he transferred from Collingwood to <a href="Victorian%20Football%20Association">Victorian Football Association</a> club, <a href="Northern%20Blues">Preston</a>. He usually played on the half forward line.
